properties.name: Aquarium,  Parco Sempione, Milan - Free WiFi!
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyThe Aquarium is a place where you can sign up for the Parco Sempione free wifi service.

properties.name: Buccinasco
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyA small residential suburb of Milan. Quiet and green with plenty of amenities.

properties.name: Fiera Milano - out of town location
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyThis is the complex which houses Milan\'s major trade fairs and exhibitions, although some fairs are held at the other site close to the centre of Milan. Easy to reach using Milan\'s red underground railway line.

properties.name: Fiera Milano City
properties.description: Posted by Alexfromitaly Milan\'s main exhibition and trade fair site. Easy to reach via Milan\'s red underground railway line. Get off at the Amendola Fiera stop.

properties.name: Great beach near Castiglione, Tuscany, Italy.
properties.description: Posted by Alexfromitaly  Unbelievable but true, this sandy beach with its shallow sea is not choc a block crowded like most other beaches in August in Italy. It\'s a good place for kids, and you can even get an ice cream from the quad bike which wanders along the beach. But watch out for strong currents which can whip you out to sea when the sea is rough - and there are no lifeguards.

properties.name: La Miniera - Ravi, Tuscany
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyWhere I spent week two of my hols in 2007. Converted mine managers house divided into 6 appartments. There is also a small bungalow. And then there is the pool. Good place. Generally very quiet.

properties.name: New Golf accessory shop here!
properties.description: Posted by Alexfromitaly  The shop is open and can be found at at Via Procaccini, 20.

properties.name: Parco Esposizioni Novegro
properties.description: Posted by Alexfromitaly    Novegro Exhibition Park - Milan

properties.name: Parco Sempione, Milan - Free WiFi!
properties.description: Posted by Alexfromitaly    The City of Milan\'s main park. Well kept, green and pleasant. An oasis of peace in the centre of the city.

properties.name: Ravi, Tuscany
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyVery small hilltop former mining village. Not much there, but the views are great and the central ex-castle area is enchanting, if a little small.

properties.name: The Duomo underground stop - Milan.
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyAlthough not indicated on the map, there is the Duomo stop here on the yellow line of the metro.

properties.name: Villetta/Bungalow, near Ravi, Tuscany
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyWonderful 3 bed bungalow with a lovely covered veranda. Dishwasher, washing machine, heating and barbecue. Very, very quiet, despite the road which passes it. We had a wonderful time here for a week in August 2007.

properties.name: Zelig Cabaret Venue, Viale Monza, 140, Milan
properties.description: Posted by Alexfromitaly
